text:
John Michael Higgins (born February 12, 1963) is an American actor and comedian. He is known for appearing on many of Christopher Guest's mockumentaries.
He also played Peter Lovett in the TV Land original sitcom "Happily Divorced" and provided the voice of Iknik Blackstone Varrick in "The Legend of Korra". He also starred in the NBC sitcom "Great News" as Chuck Pierce.
